original_text: Then said Paul, John verily baptized with the baptism of repentance, saying unto the people, that they should believe on him which should come after him, that is, on Christ Jesus.
korean_text: 바울이 이르되 요한이 회개의 세례를 베풀며 백성에게 말하되 내 뒤에 오시는 이를 믿으라 하였으니 이는 곧 예수라 하거늘

sentences.original_text: John verily baptized with the baptism of repentance
sentences.korean_translation: 요한은 진실로 회개의 세례로 세례를 베풀었다

sentences.original_text: that they should believe on him
